name: ACCloudControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room.”
”Alexa, what's the temperature in the kids room?”
”Alexa, turn on leaving home.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this Skill you will be able to control and monitor your AC Cloud Control devices through voice commands. AC Cloud Control works with Amazon Alexa to make our devices smarter and easier to use so you can make your home or business more comfortable. To control your Air Conditioner or Heat Pump using AC Cloud Control and Amazon Alexa you need: 

1. AC Cloud Control device: https://www.intesis.com/products/cloud-solutions/st-cloud-control
2. AC Cloud Control account: https://accloud.intesis.com

Control and monitor the temperature set point, the fan speed, the mode, and much more through your voice. Execute the preconfigured scenes and control many different units using a single command.
